name: Crowd Control (itch) (SOMEwaterSHOULDhelp)
description:
A little project I made a while back, it is quite a fun little game, but nothing special.

Goblins - +1 Magic, +3 Combo, 1 Point 

Skeleton - +2 Magic, +1 Combo, 2 Points

Red Demon - +1 Combo, 4 Points

Points X Combo Multiplier

W/A/S/D - Move | Left Mouse Click - Shoot | Looks towards mouse

Art Thanks to 0x72 https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii
